headline: Brown University Health could have made Newport Hospital birthing center study group more inclusive
summary: Brown University Health's Community Advisory Panel for Newport Hospital's birthing center raises public health equity concerns, as confidentiality agreements and 4-5:30 p.m. weekday meetings exclude BIPOC and low-income residents who face worse maternal health outcomes and lack transportation alternatives, while the potential closure of this WHO/UNICEF-recognized "baby friendly" facility would eliminate critical reproductive healthcare infrastructure for Newport County.

headline: Only a few days left! Help us cross the finish line
summary: Federal food assistance benefit uncertainty and potential policy changes affecting Vermont food pantries and residents facing food insecurity could generate conditions for future protests or civil unrest.
